wordbank.info: The observation of birds in their natural habitats as a hobby.
A type of tree that bears acorns as fruit.
A cascade of water falling from a height.
Walking for a long distance, especially in the woods or countryside.
The tough outer sheath of a tree.
A plant that secretes an irritant oli which can cause dermatitis.
A large area covered mostly with trees and overgrowth.
The branch of biology that deals with the relations of organisms to one another and to their physical surroundings.
The study of living organisms, divided into many specialized fields, such as ecology.
A beaten path through rough country, such as a forest or moor.
